title: Efficient, fast & responsive
text: Designed for immediate use, allowing you to start improving your research process right away. Easy and powerful tool for all

section.title: Why use Synth?
section.content: Synth streamlines research by making it easy to collect and organize information from articles. It saves you time and lets you focus on insights rather than the process.

section.title: What does Synth solve?
section.content: It eliminates the hassle of managing large volumes of research data. It simplifies information gathering, ensuring you donâ€™t miss key details.
